group_1.textRight: All right, I'll be going now.

group_1.textLeft: Um! Thank you so much.

group_1.narration: You left the Coordinator right after@Mitama told us about Doppels, so@you don't know what happened next, do you?
After that...@Mifuyu came by, with a White Feather.

group_1.textLeft: Excuse me.
Oh, hello girls! Welcome!
(Who is that? I feel like I've seen her@before...)

group_1.textRight: Pleased to meet you, Ikumi Makino.

group_1.textLeft: Huh? You know who I am?

group_1.textRight: Yes. Allow me to introduce myself. My name@is Mifuyu Azusa.

group_1.textLeft: (Mifuyu... Azusa... I feel like I've heard@that name before...)
Oh! You're the veteran Magical Girl!

group_1.textRight: I have been called that.
Shall we leave our introductions at that and@take care of those wounds?

group_1.textLeft: All done.

group_1.textRight: Uhh... Uuuhhh... What...happened?

group_1.textLeft: Yumi... Thank goodness! Are you all right?

group_1.textRight: Uh, yeah. I think I'm okay now...
I'm healed, Ikumi!

group_1.textLeft: She appears to be all right.

group_1.textRight: I'll be going now.

group_1.textLeft: Yes. Thank you.
Um... Thank you so much!
Th-thank you very much!

group_1.textRight: It's fine... Goodbye...

group_1.narration: The White Feather Mifuyu brought@with her healed Yumi's wounds.
Thanks to them, Yumi was able to take her@exam and she got into the university she@wanted, where she could play volleyball.
But, as you know...@Mifuyu didn't come to the Coordinator's@shop just to heal Yumi's wounds.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, too, Mifuyu!
How can I ever thank you enough...

group_1.textRight: You're making me a bit uncomfortable with so@much gratitude...
I didn't only come here to do a good deed...

group_1.textLeft: But you still healed Yumi's wounds.
Thanks to you, I don't have to give up on my@dream.
Thank you so very much!

group_1.textRight: [chara:100601:lipSynch_1]You have...a dream?

group_1.textLeft: Mifuyu?

group_1.textRight: I need to tell you something...
You might not like what you're about to hear.
But like it or not, you're bound to learn@about the truth eventually.
I think you should know about it now that@you know about Doppels.

group_1.textLeft: Doppels?
Oh, you were unconscious, so you don't...

group_1.textRight: If you want to know the truth, I can@explain it to you.
Be warned, however, that the truth is very@cruel...
If you don't want to hear it, I won't force@you to listen.

group_1.textLeft: (I don't want to hear it...)
(But... But, I think I'll regret it if I@don't hear her out...)
I...would like to know the truth.
Me too... It involves us, doesn't it?

group_1.textRight: Yes. It's something important for all Magical@Girls.

group_1.textLeft: Oh... That's not what she means.
I think she's asking if it involves our@dreams.

group_1.textRight: I believe it does... It's relevant to your@dreams, and your future.

group_1.textLeft: Then I'd definitely like to hear it.
Me too.

group_1.textRight: Shall we talk someplace else?
We will be going now, Mitama. Excuse us.

group_1.narration: We left the Coordinator's@and went to the riverbank...
Mifuyu told us about Witch transformation,@as well as the Wings of the Magius,@the group working to escape that fate.
When I learned about our@fate to turn into Witches...

group_1.textRight: I'm not asking you to decide right now if you@want to join the Wings of the Magius...
You must be exhausted today. Please go home@and think it over...

group_1.textLeft: I'll join.

group_1.textRight: What?

group_1.textLeft: I will join the Wings of the Magius.

group_1.narration: I gave my answer right away.
